name: aurumestates
description: Aurum Estates is a real estate company
overview:
Aurum Estates is a real estate company that is young, progressive and customer centric. Our distinctly different approach to real estate projects and our genuine concern for our customers are the reasons why we are what we are today- a company that is trusted by it’s customers and a company that is marked by a sense of excellence.

Aurum Estates since its formation in 2002, has come to occupy a special place for itself in the highly competitive realm of real estates, offering a range of services that is unmatched in its scope and quality. Our work bears testimony to this fact.
